message:
Confirm object visual appearance.
Requirements:
- make sure there is only one rigid body.
- make sure the object has a valid texture or appearance.
- make sure the object has all parts necessary.
complaint: separate plants as one object. It's not one object

message:
Confirm reasonable bounding box size:
1.84m, 1.79m, 2.67m
Make sure these sizes are within the same order of magnitude you expect from this object IRL.

Confirm object properties:
- burnable
- cookable
- dustyable
- freezable
Full list of iGibson abilities: burnable, cleaningTool, coldSource, cookable, dustyable, freezable, heatSource, liquid, openable, sliceable, slicer, soakable, stainable, toggleable, waterSource
Check incorrect or missing properties, especially liquid property
